moves.name: Acid
moves.effect: Hits all adjacent opponents. On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 6, the target's Insight is lowered by 1.

moves.name: Acid Armor
moves.effect: The user raises its Vitality by 2 for the rest of the scene.

moves.name: Acid Spray
moves.effect: On a successful hit, the target's Insight is lowered by 2.

moves.name: Baneful Bunker
moves.effect: Protects the user from all effects. If hit by a physical move, the attacker is Poisoned.

moves.name: Belch
moves.effect: This move can only be used if the user has consumed a Berry during the battle.

moves.name: Clear Smog
moves.effect: Resets all of the target's stat changes to zero.

moves.name: Coil
moves.effect: Raises the user's Strength, Vitality, and accuracy by 1 for the rest of the scene.

moves.name: Cross Poison
moves.effect: High critical hit ratio. On a hit, roll 1d6. On a 6, the target is Poisoned.

moves.name: Gastro Acid
moves.effect: Suppresses the target's Ability for the rest of the scene.

moves.name: Gunk Shot
moves.effect: High chance to miss. On a hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target is Poisoned.

moves.name: Mortal Spin
moves.effect: Poisons all adjacent opponents and removes any binding moves or hazards from the user's side of the field.

moves.name: Poison Fang
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target is Badly Poisoned.

moves.name: Poison Gas
moves.effect: Poisons all adjacent opponents.

moves.name: Poison Jab
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target is Poisoned.

moves.name: Poison Powder
moves.effect: The target is Poisoned.

moves.name: Poison Sting
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target is Poisoned.

moves.name: Poison Tail
moves.effect: High critical hit ratio. On a hit, roll 1d6. On a 6, the target is Poisoned.

moves.name: Purify
moves.effect: Cures an ally of a status condition and restores some of the user's HP.

moves.name: Shell Side Arm
moves.effect: This move targets the foe's lower defensive stat (Vitality or Insight). On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target is Poisoned.

moves.name: Sludge
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target is Poisoned.

moves.name: Sludge Bomb
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target is Poisoned.

moves.name: Sludge Wave
moves.effect: Hits all Pokémon on the field except the user. On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 6, the target is Poisoned.

moves.name: Smog
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target is Poisoned.

moves.name: Toxic
moves.effect: The target is Badly Poisoned.

moves.name: Toxic Spikes
moves.effect: Lays a hazard on the opponent's side of the field. Grounded Pokémon that switch in become Poisoned. Using it twice makes them Badly Poisoned.

moves.name: Toxic Thread
moves.effect: Poisons the target and lowers its Dexterity by 1.

moves.name: Venom Drench
moves.effect: Lowers the Strength, Special, and Dexterity of all Poisoned opponents by 1.

moves.name: Venoshock
moves.effect: If the target is already Poisoned, this move's damage is doubled.
